newsitem.title: UK: UK grain futures close easier.
newsitem.headline: UK grain futures close easier.

text.p: UK grain futures closed easier on a mixture of profit-taking from Monday's firmer close and currency factors.
Wheat futures finished 0.65 to one sterling down after trading some 951 lots, while barley ended 0.50 to one sterling lower. Barley traded just 31 lots.
The delivered market floundered due to a lack of material on offer from farmers.
"Until the farmers release material for sale the delivered market will probably remain in the doldrums," one trader said.
Amsterdam wheat futures remained tradeless and prices were unchanged, where quoted.
